mapper.select: select * from emoji.route where startDate between #{from} and #{to} and routeName like CONCAT('%',#{routeWord},'%') or routeTag like CONCAT('%',#{routeWord},'%') or budget like CONCAT('%',#{routeWord},'%');

select d.deliciousName,d.deliciousAddress,d.deliciousGrade,d.deliciousDetail from delicious d, route r, routeDelicious rd where rd.routeNum=r.routeNum and rd.deliciousNum=d.deliciousNum and rd.routeNum=#{routeNum} order by rd.order;
select joinstate from emoji.join where routeNum=#{routeNum} and memberNum=#{memberNum};
